description: Bisulfite-Seq data for 3 Acute promyelocytic leukemia sample(s). 24 run(s), 3 experiment(s), 3 alignment(s) on human genome GRCh38. Part of BLUEPRINT release August 2015. Analysis documentation available at http://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/blueprint/releases/20150820/homo_sapiens/README_bisulphite_analysis_CNAG_20150820
